attributes.action: prevent the payment of bonuses to bankers employed at those banks which have received taxpayer's support
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The irresponsible actions of the banks over the past 5 years has been the primary cause of the current financial crisis.  People are losing their jobs and salaries are being cut.  Bank staff should not be rewarded for good performance.  Individuals should share collective responsibility.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
